description: Complete comprehensive clinical rules - All 100 rules (R1-R100) for symptom patterns and conditions

rules.name: Myocardial Infarction
rules.recommendation: üö® **EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Do not drive yourself.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic MI presentation with autonomic symptoms

rules.name: Meningitis
rules.clinical_notes: Classic meningitis triad - fever, headache, neck stiffness

rules.name: Pneumonia
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - Seek immediate medical evaluation for antibiotic treatment.
rules.clinical_notes: Higher risk in elderly and immunocompromised

rules.name: Appendicitis
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - Go to ER immediately. May require surgery.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic appendicitis presentation with RLQ pain

rules.name: Arrhythmia
rules.clinical_notes: Higher risk with known heart disease

rules.name: Pancreatitis
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - Go to ER. May require hospitalization.
rules.clinical_notes: Severe abdominal pain radiating to back

rules.name: Urinary Tract Infection
rules.recommendation: üìû **MEDICAL EVALUATION** - UTI requires urinalysis and antibiotics.

rules.name: Rheumatoid Arthritis
rules.recommendation: üìã **RHEUMATOLOGY EVALUATION** - Autoimmune arthritis requires specialist care.

rules.name: Temporal Arteritis
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - Risk of blindness. Immediate steroid treatment needed.

rules.name: Lung Cancer
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT ONCOLOGY EVALUATION** - Chest imaging and biopsy needed.

rules.name: Pneumonia/Pleurisy
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - Chest X-ray and antibiotic evaluation needed.
rules.clinical_notes: Pleuritic chest pain with respiratory symptoms

rules.name: Heart Failure
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT CARDIAC CARE** - Decompensated heart failure needs treatment.

rules.name: Arrhythmia/Orthostatic Hypotension
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - Cardiac evaluation and orthostatic vitals needed.

rules.name: Possible GI Malignancy
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT GI EVALUATION** - CT abdomen and GI consultation needed.
rules.clinical_notes: Constitutional GI symptoms concerning for malignancy

rules.name: Diabetes Mellitus
rules.recommendation: üìã **DIABETES EVALUATION** - Blood glucose and A1C testing needed.

rules.name: Spinal Infection/TB
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - MRI spine and infectious disease consultation.

rules.name: Systemic Lupus/Vasculitis
rules.recommendation: üìã **RHEUMATOLOGY EVALUATION** - ANA and autoimmune workup needed.

rules.name: Panic Attack
rules.recommendation: üß† **ANXIETY MANAGEMENT** - Rule out cardiac causes first.

rules.name: Shigella/IBD
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT GI EVALUATION** - Stool culture and colonoscopy needed.

rules.name: Subarachnoid Hemorrhage/Meningitis
rules.recommendation: üö® **EMERGENCY** - Call 911. CT head and LP urgently needed.

rules.name: Acute Coronary Syndrome
rules.clinical_notes: Classic anginal chest pain with radiation

rules.name: Acute Metabolic Derangement
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - IV fluids and electrolyte correction needed.

rules.name: Decompensated Heart Failure
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT CARDIAC CARE** - Diuretics and cardiac monitoring needed.

rules.name: Malignant Hypertension/PRES
rules.recommendation: üö® **EMERGENCY** - Call 911. Hypertensive emergency needs immediate treatment.

rules.name: Myositis/Rhabdomyolysis
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - CK levels, kidney function monitoring needed.
rules.clinical_notes: Muscle breakdown with risk of kidney injury

rules.name: Cholangitis
rules.clinical_notes: Charcot's triad - fever, jaundice, RUQ pain

rules.name: Hypothyroidism
rules.recommendation: üìã **ENDOCRINE EVALUATION** - TSH and T4 levels needed.

rules.name: Diabetes Mellitus
rules.recommendation: üìã **DIABETES EVALUATION** - Urgent glucose testing and diabetes management.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic diabetic triad with weight loss

rules.name: Brain Lesion/Epilepsy
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT NEUROLOGY** - Brain imaging and EEG needed.
rules.clinical_notes: New onset seizures require urgent workup

rules.name: Cauda Equina Syndrome
rules.provisional_diagnosis: Spinal cord compression / Cauda equina syndrome
rules.clinical_notes: Neurologic emergency - permanent damage if delayed

rules.name: Hematologic Disorder
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT HEMATOLOGY** - CBC, peripheral smear, and bone marrow biopsy.
rules.clinical_notes: Bleeding with cytopenias concerning for leukemia

rules.name: Lymphoma
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT ONCOLOGY** - Lymph node biopsy and staging studies.

rules.name: Lung Cancer/TB
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT PULMONOLOGY** - Chest CT and bronchoscopy needed.

rules.name: Pleuritis/Pulmonary Embolism
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - CT-PA and D-dimer for PE evaluation.
rules.clinical_notes: Pleuritic chest pain requires PE workup

rules.name: Pyelonephritis
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - IV antibiotics and hospitalization may be needed.

rules.name: Bowel Obstruction
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT SURGICAL EVALUATION** - CT abdomen and surgical consultation.

rules.name: Infectious Colitis/IBD
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT GI EVALUATION** - Stool studies and colonoscopy.

rules.name: Infectious Spondylitis/Meningitis
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - MRI spine, LP, and IV antibiotics.

rules.name: Peptic Ulcer/Esophagitis
rules.recommendation: üìã **GI EVALUATION** - Upper endoscopy and PPI therapy.

rules.name: BPH/Urinary Obstruction
rules.clinical_notes: Lower urinary tract symptoms in older men

rules.name: Testicular Torsion/Epididymitis
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT UROLOGY** - Doppler ultrasound, possible emergency surgery.

rules.name: Panic Disorder/Anxiety
rules.recommendation: üß† **PSYCHIATRIC EVALUATION** - Rule out medical causes first.

rules.name: Renal Cell Carcinoma/Urologic Pathology
rules.clinical_notes: Hematuria with systemic symptoms in smoker

rules.name: Alcoholic Hepatitis/Hepatic Failure
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT HEPATOLOGY** - LFTs, coagulation studies, alcohol cessation.

rules.name: Major Depressive Disorder
rules.recommendation: üß† **PSYCHIATRIC EVALUATION** - Antidepressants, therapy, suicide risk assessment.

rules.name: Alzheimer's Disease/Dementia
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **NEUROLOGY EVALUATION** - Cognitive testing, brain MRI, dementia workup.

rules.name: Drug Reaction/Viral Exanthem
rules.clinical_notes: Systemic drug reaction vs viral illness

rules.name: Hypothyroidism
rules.recommendation: üìã **ENDOCRINE EVALUATION** - TSH, T4, thyroid hormone replacement.

rules.name: Vascular Fragility/Hypertensive Bleed
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT BP MANAGEMENT** - Blood pressure control, ENT evaluation.

rules.name: Acute Glaucoma/Optic Neuritis
rules.clinical_notes: Acute angle-closure glaucoma is ophthalmologic emergency

rules.name: Stroke/Facial Nerve Lesion
rules.clinical_notes: Acute stroke symptoms - time is brain

rules.name: Cellulitis/Soft Tissue Infection
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT** - IV antibiotics, surgical drainage if abscess.
rules.clinical_notes: Bacterial skin and soft tissue infection

rules.name: Lymphoma/TB
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT ONCOLOGY/ID** - Lymph node biopsy, TB testing.

rules.name: Cauda Equina Syndrome
rules.clinical_notes: Neurologic emergency - permanent paralysis if delayed

rules.name: Rheumatic Fever/Lupus Flare
rules.clinical_notes: Acute rheumatic disease with cardiac risk

rules.name: SVT/Benign Arrhythmia
rules.recommendation: üìã **CARDIAC EVALUATION** - Holter monitor, electrophysiology if recurrent.

rules.name: Infectious Mononucleosis/EBV
rules.recommendation: üìã **ID EVALUATION** - Monospot, CBC, avoid contact sports.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic mono triad with splenomegaly risk

rules.name: Hypokalemia/Hypomagnesemia
rules.recommendation: üìã **ELECTROLYTE CORRECTION** - IV K+ and Mg2+ replacement.

rules.name: Diabetes Mellitus
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT DIABETES EVALUATION** - Immediate glucose testing, diabetes management.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic diabetic tetrad with constitutional symptoms
